title: Disconnected and can't reenter even though my internet connection is fine
body: I just got disconnected in game, quit to reenter and even though my internet connection is fine it says I can't connect to the server.  Am I the only one this just happened to or did the server crash?  its been over 10 minutes and the game is still open but I can't reenter.

replies.body: been well over an hour since the start of the game and it says the game is still open...i guess everyone got d/c?  How is service status still okay?
Server's seem to be up and running fine! http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na You guy's/girl's still having issues?

i got dced and tried to reconnect wouldnt for about 20 minutes and by the time i could the game was over then i got a leave buster which to me is un called for and i feel i dont deserve a wait time for issues i couldnt control
No connection is possible! I was in the campionselectation and just got an DC. Now i am unable to reconnect!
